title: Boost My Phone(Android Wear)
summary: Boost my phone from Android wear(Android watch) by one click
description: Boost My Phone is an fast and effective tools to clean your device memory though Android watch.It is designed to speed of your phone by clean unused memory and reclaim the storage.Unlike other device booster, you do not have to open your phone to do it. All you need is just a simple click in your android watch and it will magically  clean your device smoothly. The report will send to you android  immediately Feature:- One Click clean and boost- Clean the device through Android Watch- No device opening need when user trigger device boostHow to use:(1) Pair your watch with your mobile device ( Android phone or Pad)       Ref Google Tutorial https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6056630?hl=en(2) Go to your watch, Click screen or speak "OK Google"(3) In "Speak Now " screen, scroll screen to the bottom and go to start menu of Android wear(4) In start menu, Click Boostmyphone or its icon to launch our app------ Step 1 to Step 4 is general steps for all apps running in Android wear(5) Click the screen to boost your phone(6) Screen will display cleaned task size, freed memory size and how fast the device is boosted
descriptionHTML:
Boost My Phone is an fast and effective tools to clean your device memory though Android watch.
It is designed to speed of your phone by clean unused memory and reclaim the storage.

Unlike other device booster, you do not have to open your phone to do it. All you need is just a simple click in your android watch and it will magically clean your device smoothly. The report will send to you android immediately

Feature:

- One Click clean and boost
- Clean the device through Android Watch
- No device opening need when user trigger device boost

How to use:

(1) Pair your watch with your mobile device ( Android phone or Pad)
Ref Google Tutorial https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6056630?hl=en
(2) Go to your watch, Click screen or speak "OK Google"
(3) In "Speak Now " screen, scroll screen to the bottom and go to start menu of Android wear
(4) In start menu, Click Boostmyphone or its icon to launch our app

------ Step 1 to Step 4 is general steps for all apps running in Android wear

(5) Click the screen to boost your phone
(6) Screen will display cleaned task size, freed memory size and how fast the device is boosted
comments: It's Quick This ap works well with my Android. I like how fast the missles work. IT cleans Quick.
3 stars now and if it works then two more star for the app
Nice app Not perfect but go
Boost my phone This app is user friendly. Awesome
